name: Tsuchinoko Kissing Game
description:
Have you ever wanted to kiss a tsuchinoko? If YES, now you can with TSUCHINOKO KISSING GAME. If NO, please don't lie to me.

In TSUCHINOKO KISSING GAME, you play as [INSERT YOUR NAME HERE], partner to a local tsuchinoko named Noko. The two of you have been DATING for around six months now, and you think it's about time the two of you KISS!

HOWEVER, there's a problem! Each of you wants to KISS the other first! Oh no! Luckily, Noko has a solution. In the small town of CRYPTID VILLAGE, there's a tradition. In situations like this, two lovebird may partake in a 3 day competition known as....

THE BATTLE DATING ACTION

or B.D.A. for short.

You have 3 days to raise your AFFECTION POINTS as high as you can through EXCITING TURN-BASED RPG DATING ROMANCE COMBAT ACTION!

Who will get the first kiss? You, or Noko? Either way, you both win in...

TSUCHINOKO KISSING GAME

If you're enjoying some sweet tsuchinoko tunes, you can find the whole OST here: https://nephetheus.bandcamp.com/album/tsuchinoko-kissing-game-ost
